name: Full Comply-Desk Compliance Library (All 7 Kits)
description: Access all seven Comply-Desk compliance kits at a discounted rate.

name: Web & Data Compliance Bundle
description: ADA Website Compliance Kit + Privacy, Data & Consent Policy Kit for online and data-heavy small businesses.

name: People & Contractor Compliance Bundle
description: Employee Handbook & Policy Kit + Contractor / 1099 Compliance & Onboarding Kit to cover your team and contractors.

name: Safety Essentials Bundle (OSHA + Safety SOPs)
description: OSHA Compliance Essentials Kit + Workplace Safety SOPs Kit for a practical safety starter pack.

name: ADA Website Compliance Kit
description: Accessibility statement, WCAG-aligned checklist, remediation recommendations, and accommodation request response templates.

name: Emergency Preparedness & Response Kit
description: Fire, medical, natural disaster and workplace emergency response plans, communication procedures, and supply checklists.

name: Workplace Safety SOPs Kit
description: Standard operating procedures for daily safety, equipment use, hazard reporting, cleaning protocols and inspection forms.

name: Employee Handbook & Policy Kit
description: AI-generated employee handbook, code of conduct, leave and PTO policies, remote work policies, and acknowledgement templates.

name: Contractor / 1099 Compliance & Onboarding Kit
description: Independent contractor agreement, onboarding checklist, misclassification risk checklist, and practical 1099 compliance guidelines.

name: Privacy, Data & Consent Policy Kit
description: Privacy policy, cookie policy, data retention standards, incident/breach response checklist, and third-party data processing language.

name: OSHA Compliance Essentials Kit
description: OSHA-aligned core safety manual, hazard communication and PPE guidance, incident report templates and safety acknowledgement language.
